publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-421 Hugh Henry: The Draft Victim Statements (Prescribed Courts) (Scotland) Order 2003—That the Justice 1 Committee recommends that the draft Victim Statements (Prescribed Courts) (Scotland) Order 2003 be approved. Supported by: Cathy Jamieson*

S2M-421 Hugh Henry: The Draft Victim Statements (Prescribed Courts) (Scotland) Order 2003—That the Justice 1 Committee recommends that the draft Victim Statements (Prescribed Courts) (Scotland) Order 2003 be approved. Supported by: Cathy Jamieson
